about_the_game:
The business game that doesn't look like a spreadsheet!


In A Millionaire’s Story, you run a start-up. Make sure your clients are satisfied by managing the resources and the employees. Make decisions to overcome the challenges. Improve yourself as a leader and discover the perfect strategies to build a million-dollar business.

What are the key features?


-Choose Clients;
-Manage team and resources for a project to be successful;
-Grow yourself as an individual and a leader;
-Scale up and develop new strategies for next month.

What's this game about?


In A Millionaire’s Story, you run a start-up from scratch.



There will be two characters to select at the beginning of the gameplay, each with fears, motivations, ambitions, etc. These represent all young people who want to build their start-ups. To achieve the goal of becoming a millionaire, the player needs to get out of his comfort zone,try business strategies, fail, face life events while his team needs him, fail again, and so on, until he reaches his final goal, or maybe not...



It depends on what choices you make!



You will have the power to manage your team, train it to grow better and better, and try to satisfy your customers.



To become a better leader, and entrepreneur, you should also take your time and "sharpen your saw". Go to the gym, read books, meditate, all of this will help you manage your business and your relationship with your team.



Once a month you will analyze your progress, see projects that succeeded or failed, prepare your strategy for the next month, upgrade your office, or if you can't afford, just your equipment, hire or fire employees, and if you really hit the jackpot, even buying a supercar or a vacation, the choice is yours!

Only you can change your future! Wishlist now!
